SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Represents a student's application to an internship posting.
AuthenticationController
Controller responsible for authentication-related operations.
AuthenticationInterface
Command-line authentication interface for the application.
BaseController
Base controller that provides common CSV read/write utilities and helpers used by other controllers.
CareerCenterStaff
Represents a Career Centre staff user.
CareerCenterStaffController
Controller for Career Centre staff operations.
CareerCenterStaffInterface
Command-line interface for Career Center staff.
CommandLineInterface
Simple interface for command-line interactive components in the application.
CompanyRepresentative
Represents a company representative user.
CompanyRepresentativeController
Controller for company representative operations.
CompanyRepresentativeInterface
Command-line interface for company representatives.
Internship
Represents an internship posting created by a company representative.
InternshipManagementSystem
Entry point for the Internship Placement Management System.
Student
Represents a student user of the internship placement system.
StudentController
Controller for student-facing operations.
StudentInterface
Command-line interface for students.
User
Abstract base class for all user types in the system.
Withdrawal
Represents a student's withdrawal request for an application/offer.
